submission.title: The Engineer's Ledger and the People-Centered Paraidox
submission.overview: This submission presents a multifaceted synthesis of perspectives from an i4j town hall that explored how AI can serve human flourishing through pragmatic design, data dignity, and civic accountability. From Vint Cerf's empirical assessments to David Nordfors's VeMe concept, and from creative industry safeguards to behavioral science in HR, the discussion mapped the contours of a people-centered AI paradigm. The convergence across sectors—tech, policy, education, and entertainment—suggests a reframing of the so-called Paraidox: embracing AI to enhance, not replace, human intelligence. This submission was generated with protocol META-DP-EVAL-v1.3 and is based on the i4j town hall 'Harnessing AI for Productivity and Meaningful Work.'

directly_addressed_dps.summary: Cerf's call for an 'AI driver's licence' implies authenticated competence before engagement.
VeMe and story-driven AI models center user agency over platform dominance.
VeMe vaults anchor data in user-controlled, agentic structures.
Reinforces readiness for implementation, not just theory.
Startups and unions train creators, fostering meta-community skill sharing.
Promotes AI that elevates human intelligence, not just automation.
Hollywood's AI clauses exemplify enforceable ethical standards.
Disclosure mandates and certifications build trust infrastructure.
Behavioral psychometrics build adaptive vocational reputation systems.

directly_addressed_dps.dp: DP19 - Amplifying Presence and Community Engagement
directly_addressed_dps.summary: Promotes cultural readiness and participatory 'kind AI'.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: AI Driver's Licence Proposal
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Cerf's metaphor suggests a lightweight federated credentialing system ensuring safe and competent AI use.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Bridges innovation and public safety without heavy gatekeeping.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: VeMe Vaults as Sovereign Data Units
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: VeMes act as AI agents governed solely by individual users, not just data containers.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Supports interoperable but user-controlled AI participation.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Ethical AI in Hollywood Contracts
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Contractual transparency for AI usage and likeness establishes governance precedents beyond algorithms.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Expands transparency into legal, professional, and creative domains.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Psychometric Fingerprinting in Workforce Development
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Behavioral AIs adjust to vocational feedback to elevate hidden talent and diversify hiring.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Creates dynamic, context-sensitive reputation loops for workforce equity and efficiency.
